title: 02/04/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/04/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NBC's Peter King about Tom Brady's decision to retire. Did it come as a surprise? NFL Network's Peter Schrager discusses whether he thinks the Dolphins head coaching vacancy is appealing? And Tony Dungy shares a story about an owner that regretted not hiring him as his head coach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
